tool_description: Maintains comprehensive logs of all generated alerts with performance tracking and false positive analysis.

alert_data.description: Array of alert records to log

lookback_days.description: Days of alert history to analyze (1-365)

error_messages: No alert data provided: At least one alert record must be provided.
Invalid lookback period: Must be between 1 and 365 days.
Invalid alert format: Alert records must be properly formatted strings.
usage: Provide alert_data array and optionally specify lookback_days for historical analysis. Returns alert statistics and trends.

total_alerts.description: Total number of alerts in the period

alerts_by_severity.description: Count of alerts by severity level

false_positive_rate.description: Estimated false positive rate as percentage

most_active_rules.description: Rules that generated the most alerts

alert_frequency_trend.description: Trend in alert frequency over time
